law.text: Every project of the authority shall be open to regular policing by the Department of Kentucky State Police as in the case of other public highways of the Commonwealth.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 183, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 173, sec. 8, effective March 25, 1960.
